# 10.0 Docs

- [Breaking change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/wpf/10.0/dynamicresource-crash.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where incorrect usage of DynamicResource now causes application crashes.
- [Breaking change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/wpf/10.0/empty-grid-definitions.md): Learn about the breaking change in WPF in .NET 10 where empty Grid.ColumnDefinitions or Grid.RowDefinitions declarations now cause MC3063 compilation errors.
